title: As1one: The Israeli-Palestinian Pop Music Journey
english_title: As1one: The Israeli-Palestinian Pop Music Journey (2024)
description: Follows the international launch, journeys, and stories of As1One, which is made up of singers, rappers and instrumentalists.
